list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add OpenAPI spec integration.
- Add dependencies for Swagger/OpenAPI. - Update Application class to load and register OpenAPI resource.

task.summary:
Initial import.
- Import generated boilerplate template.

Add database support and fist Movie entity.
- Add dependencies for hibernate and h2 database. - Add database parameter to config.yml. - Add Movie entity with first attributes. - Update Configuration and Application class to support hibernate and database parameters.

Add Movies resource controller to create and query movies.
- Add DAO class for movies. - Add resource controller to create and query movies. - Update Application class to enable resource controller for movies. - Update Movie class to add sql query string and add parameter validation. - Update readme to add cli commands for adding and querying movies.

Add Movie resource controller to query a single movie.
- Add resource controller to query a single movie. - Update Application class to enable resource controller for single movie queries.

Add delete operation to Movie resource controller.
- Update MovieResource controller to support delete operation. - Update MovieDAO to add deleteById().

Fix bug when deleting non-existing movie and improve response.
- Update MovieDAO to fix bug when deleting a non-existing dataset. - Update MovieResource controller to return status code instead of boolean.

Add update operation to Movie resource controller.
- Update MovieResource controller to support update operation. - Update MovieDAO to add update().

Add filter by year of publication feature.
- Update MoviesResource controller to support optional publicationYear parameter. - Update MovieDAO to add findByPublicationYear(). - Update Movie class to add query string for filtering by publicationYear.

Fix typo in Movie class.
- Update Movie class to fix copy-paste-typo in name of setter.

MESSAGE.value:
Initial import.
- Import generated boilerplate template.

Add database support and fist Movie entity.
- Add dependencies for hibernate and h2 database. - Add database parameter to config.yml. - Add Movie entity with first attributes. - Update Configuration and Application class to support hibernate and database parameters.

Add Movies resource controller to create and query movies.
- Add DAO class for movies. - Add resource controller to create and query movies. - Update Application class to enable resource controller for movies. - Update Movie class to add sql query string and add parameter validation. - Update readme to add cli commands for adding and querying movies.

Add Movie resource controller to query a single movie.
- Add resource controller to query a single movie. - Update Application class to enable resource controller for single movie queries.

Add delete operation to Movie resource controller.
- Update MovieResource controller to support delete operation. - Update MovieDAO to add deleteById().

Fix bug when deleting non-existing movie and improve response.
- Update MovieDAO to fix bug when deleting a non-existing dataset. - Update MovieResource controller to return status code instead of boolean.

Add update operation to Movie resource controller.
- Update MovieResource controller to support update operation. - Update MovieDAO to add update().

Add filter by year of publication feature.
- Update MoviesResource controller to support optional publicationYear parameter. - Update MovieDAO to add findByPublicationYear(). - Update Movie class to add query string for filtering by publicationYear.

Fix typo in Movie class.
- Update Movie class to fix copy-paste-typo in name of setter.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
